summary: Provides a foundational entry point for the Dask compute backend, handling the creation of Dask collections from existing data and registering the backend‑specific dispatch functions needed for task execution. Includes utilities to translate objects into Dask representations and to invoke the appropriate dispatch mechanisms.
business_intent: Facilitate integration of Dask as the underlying execution engine for a higher‑level library, allowing users to work with native data structures while the system automatically creates Dask collections and routes compute operations through Dask’s task scheduler.
